sqlMap.select: SELECT COMPANYCODE, DATAYEAR, DANWICODE, KIKWANCODE, PROJECTCODE, DEPARTCODE, IWOLGBN, YESANCODE, MOKCODE, WONINNO, WONINDATE, CUSTCODE, SANGHO, REMARK, AMOUNT, IUSERID, IDATE, UUSERID, UDATE, SIGNDATE, SIGNSAWON, STATUS, END_DATE, END_AMOUNT, END_ID, END_DATE_CAN, WONINGBN, REMARKDETAIL, PROC_STATUS, SIGNID, ACCNTCODE_CHA, ACCNTCODE_DAE FROM T_BD_300 ORDER BY DATAYEAR DESC , WONINDATE DESC
